keyword: how many calories in a saltine cracker
title: How Many Calories in a Saltine Cracker?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a saltine cracker, including carbs, sodium, fat, and full nutrition breakdown per cracker for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Saltine Cracker?
assumptions: Standard 2-inch square saltine cracker, plain, baked, no toppings or added fats.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, and recipe; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One saltine cracker has about 13 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a saltine cracker?
faqs.a: About 13 kcal per standard saltine cracker.

faqs.q: What's the sodium in one saltine?
faqs.a: Around 135 mg of sodium per cracker.
They have about 2.1 g carbs per cracker, mostly refined.

faqs.q: Do saltines have any protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.3 g protein and 0.3 g fat per cracker.

faqs.q: How do brands differ in saltine calories?
faqs.a: Most are 12-15 kcal; check labels for exact values.
